title: 'Godzilla vs. Kong' to battle in 2020
text:
'Godzilla vs. Kong' to battle in 2020 This monster screen battle is going to be doubly big. Post to Facebook 'Godzilla vs. Kong' to battle in 2020 This monster screen battle is going to be doubly big. Check out this story on USATODAY.com: http://usat.ly/1LurEho Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs 'Godzilla vs. Kong' to battle in 2020 USA TODAY 6:19 p.m. EDT October 14, 2015 A scene from the motion picture King Kong vs. Godzilla in the 1962 version (Photo: niversal) CONNECT 3 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Godzilla vs. Kong is going down in 2020. 
Warner Bros. and Legendary Pictures announced on Wednesday that they will be teaming up in a monster heavy partnership which will lead to the 2020 epic battle of the beasts. 
Warner Bros' Godzilla and Legendary's King Kong will monster pummel each other on one screen. It's not to early to start building that large monster shelter 
The first films in this monster partnership have already been announced: Kong: Skull Island , which opens on March 10, 2017, and Godzilla 2 on June 8, 2018. 
Legendary CEO Thomas Tull expressed his excitement about the 2020 battle in a statement. "As a lifelong fan of these characters, I've always wanted to see the ultimate showdown, and today we're pleased to be announcing that and more." Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/1LurEho TOP VIDEOS
